Title: Lalsalu
Writer: Shahjahan Chowdhury (screenplay advisor), Tanvir Mokammel (screenplay), Syed Waliullah (novel)
Actors: Raisul Islam Asad, Munira Yusuf Memy, Chandni, Aly Zaker
Plot: In this tragic-comic study of religious hypocrisy, a disreputable cleric convinces villagers that their community is home to a famous holyman's grave.
